statements: SELECT * FROM returned_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM returned_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM returned_inventory ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM returned_inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM returned_inventory WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM returned_inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM returned_inventory WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM returned_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND return_date <= '2022-03-15';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM returned_inventory WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT id, product_name FROM returned_products WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM returned_products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM reusable_parts WHERE condition = 'new';
SELECT product_name, quantity, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT part_name, condition FROM reusable_parts WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, part_name, quantity FROM reusable_parts WHERE condition = 'new' ORDER BY quantity DESC, part_name ASC;
SELECT return_date, product_name, quantity FROM returned_products WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC, return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedProducts;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM ReturnedProducts;
SELECT product_id, product_name, return_date FROM ReturnedProducts ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedProducts WHERE return_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) as total_returns FROM ReturnedProducts GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_id, product_name, return_date FROM ReturnedProducts WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM ReusableParts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedProducts WHERE return_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, product_id, return_date, returned_by FROM ReturnLogs WHERE returned_by LIKE '%John%';
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM ReturnedProducts JOIN ReturnLogs ON ReturnedProducts.product_id = ReturnLogs.product_id WHERE ReturnLogs.return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE return_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM returned_parts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM reuse_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT tracking_id, return_date, return_status FROM return_tracking WHERE return_status = 'pending';
SELECT id, product_name, return_date, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT part_name, part_description, quantity FROM returned_parts WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_name AS alias_name, item_description FROM reuse_inventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, return_date, return_status FROM return_tracking WHERE return_status='Pending' GROUP BY return_date HAVING return_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM returned_products rp JOIN returned_parts rpart ON rp.id = rpart.part_id WHERE rp.product_name LIKE '%phone%' OR rpart.part_description LIKE '%battery%';
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM reusable_products WHERE reuse_status = 'reusable';
SELECT part_name, part_number FROM returned_parts ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name FROM reusable_products WHERE reuse_status = 'not_reusable' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM product_history WHERE action_type = 'return' OR action_type = 'reuse' ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT id, product_name FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE id = 5;
SELECT part_name, part_number FROM returned_parts ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reusable_products WHERE reuse_status = 'reusable';
